version_description:
iOS 9 picture in picture support so you can now play Stan in a small window whilst multitasking on your iPad.
Improvements to the video player
Volume control has been added back into the player
New and improved series page
Bug Fixes

* Thumbnail images display when scrolling through video
* Minor bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes
We've made improvements to Chromecast including faster load times and performance enhancements.

- Improved performance when loading the home screen
- Now you can swipe to go back from TV show and movie pages
- Improvements to Chromecast
- Additional bug fixes
- Fixed issue affecting video playback on iPhone 5 and iPad 4 devices that had updated to iOS 10

* Download Movies and TV Shows to watch offline
* Added more details to TV Series
* Minor UI updates
* Performance improvements
* Bug fixes
We've made some bug fixes and performance upgrades.

* Improvements to video playback and app performance
* iPhone X support
* Bug fixes
- Improvements to video playback and app performance

We've made some updates to make it easier to browse and watch Stan's awesome TV shows and movies. Of course, we've also included some bug fixes and performance upgrades. Stay tuned for more updates coming soon.
Support for iOS 12
To go with the regular bug fixes and usability upgrades, we have also added support for iPad Pro.
